channel.title: Client IP Problem
channel.description:
Hey Guys. Well each time I go On the Client. I could Get On. But my Friends Can't. I think I found the Source of the Problem. Its [code]server = "127.0.0.1";[/code] I changed it to [code]server = "deceivedpkz.no-ip.biz";[/code] And I coulden't get on. No one Could. I compiled right. It said my server is Offline. I spelled the Ip right and Everything is Correct.
Im sorry, I didn't mean to post it here. But I didn't know where to post it Becouse its Based on the Client and also the Server :P

item.title: Client IP Problem
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

Did you follow everything in The Soul’s How To Start A Server Thread: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

Also, if that doesn’t help, try these:

Open run. Type cmd, and then when a black box comes up, type ipconfig. Then look for your IPV4 Address, which will be like this: 192.168.#.***

When you portforward, remember to have the three stars(***) matching your IPv4 address.

Also, did you open the port in your computer? That has to be done.

Read full topic

item.title: Client IP Problem

item.description:
@WhipDrag wrote:

Hey Guys. Well each time I go On the Client. I could Get On. But my Friends Can’t. I think I found the Source of the Problem.
Its

server = "127.0.0.1";

I changed it to

server = "deceivedpkz.no-ip.biz";

And I coulden’t get on. No one Could. I compiled right.
It said my server is Offline. I spelled the Ip right and Everything is Correct.

Im sorry, I didn’t mean to post it here. But I didn’t know where to post it Becouse its Based on the Client and also the Server
